original_text: Then I said to the nobles, the officials and the rest of the people, “The work is extensive and spread out, and we are widely separated from each other along the wall.
korean_text: 내가 귀족들과 민장들과 남은 백성에게 이르기를 이 공사는 크고 넓으므로 우리가 성에서 떨어져 거리가 먼즉

sentences.original_text: Then I said to the nobles
the officials and the rest of the people
The work is extensive and spread out
and we are widely separated from each other
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 서로 널리 분리되어 있다
